title: ID2D1Geometry::FillContainsPoint(D2D1_POINT_2F,const D2D1_MATRIX_3X2_F &,FLOAT,BOOL) (d2d1.h)
description: Indicates whether the area filled by the geometry would contain the specified point given the specified flattening tolerance. (overload 1/2)
